projects.title: Basheer Flour Shop - Official Website
projects.description: Custom-built e-commerce solution for a local flour mill business. Features bilingual support, product management system, and direct WhatsApp ordering to streamline customer purchases.

projects.title: Trendzx Cart - AI-Powered E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform [In Development] with AI-powered product recommendations. Features user authentication, shopping cart, product management, and admin dashboard. Built with modern MERN stack practices.
